help_command:
I am able to import your wall or group VK posts into your Telegram channel. All you need is a public VK wall and a Telegram channel with the username specified. It is also required to make me the channel admin so that I can fill it with new posts every 10 minutes.

You can either change the wall and channel address anytime or even remove this connection. Type now /setVk for adding/editing the wall name, /getVk for checking connection and /delVk for stopping import. More questions? Ask @sergeykozyakov.
